titleStmt.title: The case of the Irish Protestants in relation to recognising, or swearing allegiance to, and praying for King William and Queen Mary, stated and resolved.
titleStmt.author: Wettenhall, Edward, 1636-1713.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Robert Clavel, and are to be sold by John North, bookseller in Dublin,

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Edward Wettenhall by Wing.
Reproduction of original in the Trinity College Library, Dublin, Ireland.
